malaysian_hr_law.description: The primary legislation governing employment practices in Malaysia.

key_sections.title: Contracts of Service
key_sections.summary: Details the requirements for contracts of service between employers and employees.

key_sections.title: Termination of Contract
key_sections.summary: Outlines the conditions under which a contract of service may be terminated.

malaysian_hr_law.description: Regulates the relationship between employers and employees, including trade unions.

key_sections.title: Recognition of Trade Unions
key_sections.summary: Describes the process for employers to recognize trade unions.

key_sections.title: Collective Bargaining
key_sections.summary: Details the rights and responsibilities of parties in collective bargaining.

malaysian_hr_law.description: Ensures the safety, health, and welfare of employees at work.

key_sections.title: General Duties of Employers
key_sections.summary: Mandates employers to ensure the safety and health of their employees.

key_sections.title: Safety and Health Policy
key_sections.summary: Requires employers to formulate a safety and health policy.
